channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- fastify node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- fastify node module

item.title: CVE-2018-3711|2024-09-16T18:24:04.599Z -- hackerone -- fastify%20node%20module
item.description: Fastify node module before 0.38.0 is vulnerable to a denial-of-service attack by sending a request with "Content-Type: application/json" and a very large payload.
